QuestData.Title: Seeking Soil
QuestData.Description: <The tiny sproutling shuffles around, motioning you towards the south. You can barely hear a faint voice.>$B$BSoil...$B$B<It looks like it wants fresh soil. Maybe you should guide it to some of the richer-looking patches.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Seedling Protector to 7 patches of Rich Soil.
QuestData.RewardText: <The seedling coils its roots in what looks like a happy manner.>$B$BGrow... big...
